attributes.action: Apply laws applicable to fraud fairly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Three Metropolitan Police officers are to be prosecuted for misuse of Met credit cards, basically buying items not job related.

MPs did this yet were able to smile, pay a few bob back, and then carry on as if nothing had happened.

Surely the same laws have to apply? If these officers are prosecuted, every MP who 'misclaimed' must face the same censure.
